Sentencas: The bi-axial ring-on-ring test is a convenient method to determine elastic modulus and fracture strength of brittle materials in plate geometry.
Titulo: Ring-on-ring testing of thin, curved bi-layered materials

Sentencas: However, standard analytical relationships appear to be limited to flat isotropic samples with discrete ratios of thickness to loading/support ring radii.
Titulo: Ring-on-ring testing of thin, curved bi-layered materials

Sentencas: In addition to the necessity to consider residual stresses due to differences in thermal expansion for bi-layered materials, the curvature of thin components complicates the analysis of the experimental data.
Titulo: Ring-on-ring testing of thin, curved bi-layered materials

Sentencas: Experimental and finite element modeling results are presented for thin curved bi-layered materials with substrates of different elastic behavior.
Titulo: Ring-on-ring testing of thin, curved bi-layered materials

Sentencas: Basis for the analysis are experimental results obtained for solid oxide fuel cells with anode substrates in oxidized and reduced state.
Titulo: Ring-on-ring testing of thin, curved bi-layered materials

Sentencas: A testing procedure and its limits are outlined that permits to extend the use of standard analytical relationships to curved bi-layered specimens with the aim to determine the properties of the mechanically dominating support material.
Titulo: Ring-on-ring testing of thin, curved bi-layered materials
